languages.text: Идира Тласс, так и не найдя способа совладать с шепотами в голове, вновь пристрастилась к запрещенным стимуляторам и амасеку. Ее стали замечать разговаривающей с воображаемой "Теодорой" или безумно бормочущей что-то под нос в темном углу. Однажды ее обнаружили с простреленной головой за тем же столом, за которым погибла Теодора фон Валанциус — в одной руке она сжимала автопистолет, а в другой початую бутыль вина "Пламя чистоты" — напитка, горячо любимого Леди Теодорой.

Idira Tlass, who was never able to subdue the whispers in her head, fell back on her old crutches of prohibited stimulants and amasec. People often saw her talking to an imaginary "Theodora" or deliriously muttering to herself in a dark corner. One day she was found with a hole in her head, sitting at the desk where Theodora von Valancius had died. She held an autopistol in one hand and in the other an open bottle of Flame of Purity wine — Lady Theodora's libation of choice.
languages.original_text: Идира Тласс, так и не найдя способа совладать с шепотами в голове, вновь пристрастилась к запрещенным стимуляторам и амасеку. Ее стали замечать разговаривающей с воображаемой "Теодорой" или безумно бормочущей что-то под нос в темном углу. Однажды ее обнаружили с простреленной головой за тем же столом, за которым погибла Теодора фон Валанциус — в одной руке она сжимала автопистолет, а в другой початую бутыль вина "Пламя чистоты" — напитка, горячо любимого Леди Теодорой.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass, who was not able to find a way to deal with the whispers in her head, redeveloped a taste for banned stimulants and amasec. People noticed her talking to imaginary "Theodora" or deliriously muttering something in the corner. One day she was found with a hole in her head behind a desk, where once Theodora von Valancius died. She held an autopistol in one hand, and an open bottle of the Flame of Purity vine, the drink that Lady Theodora fervently favoured.

One day she was found with a hole in her head behind a desk, where once Theodora von Valancius died. She held an autopistol in one hand, and an open bottle of the Flame of Purity vine, the drink that Lady Theodora fervently favoured.

She held an autopistol in one hand and in the other an open bottle of Flame of Purity wine — Lady Theodora's libation of choice.

languages.text: 伊迪拉·特拉斯始终无法压制住脑子里的低语声，她再度依赖上了禁忌的兴奋剂与艾玛赛克酒，依靠它们勉强过活。人们经常看到她和想象中的“西奥多拉”对话，或是在黑暗的角落里自言自语。某一天，人们在西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯去世的桌边找到了她的尸体。她的脑袋上开了一个洞，一只手拿着一把自动手枪，另一只手攥着一瓶打开的“纯净之火”——那是西奥多拉夫人生前最喜欢的酒。
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, who was never able to subdue the whispers in her head, fell back on her old crutches of prohibited stimulants and amasec. People often saw her talking to an imaginary "Theodora" or deliriously muttering to herself in a dark corner. One day she was found with a hole in her head, sitting at the desk where Theodora von Valancius had died. She held an autopistol in one hand and in the other an open bottle of Flame of Purity wine — Lady Theodora's libation of choice.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉·特拉斯始终无法压制住脑子里的低语声，她再度依赖上了兴奋剂与艾玛赛克酒，依靠它们勉强过活。人们经常看到她和想象中的“西奥多拉”对话，或是在黑暗的角落里自言自语。某一天，人们在西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯去世的桌子后面找到了她的尸体。她的脑袋上开了一个洞，一只手拿着一把自动手枪，另一只手攥着一瓶打开的“纯净之火”——那是西奥多拉夫人生前最喜欢的酒。

languages.text: Idira Tlass, der es nie gelungen war, die flüsternden Stimmen in ihrem Kopf zu unterbrechen, stützte sich wieder auf ihre alten Krücken — verbotene Stimulanzien und Amasec. Sie war oft zu sehen, wie sie mit einer imaginären "Theodora" sprach oder in einer dunklen Ecke wie im Delirium Selbstgespräche führte. Eines Tages wurde sie hinter dem Schreibtisch, an dem Theodora von Valancius gestorben war, mit einem Loch im Kopf entdeckt. In der einen Hand hielt sie eine Maschinenpistole, in der anderen eine offene Flasche Flamme der Reinheit — Lady Theodoras Lieblingsgetränkt.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, who was never able to subdue the whispers in her head, fell back on her old crutches of prohibited stimulants and amasec. People often saw her talking to an imaginary "Theodora" or deliriously muttering to herself in a dark corner. One day she was found with a hole in her head, sitting at the desk where Theodora von Valancius had died. She held an autopistol in one hand and in the other an open bottle of Flame of Purity wine — Lady Theodora's libation of choice.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass, der es nie gelungen war, die flüsternden Stimmen in ihrem Kopf zu unterbrechen, stützte sich wieder auf ihre alten Krücken — Stimulanzien und Amasec. Sie war oft zu sehen, wie sie mit einer imaginären "Theodora" sprach oder in einer dunklen Ecke wie im Delirium Selbstgespräche führte. Eines Tages wurde sie hinter dem Schreibtisch, an dem Theodora von Valancius gestorben war, mit einem Loch im Kopf entdeckt. In der einen Hand hielt sie eine Maschinenpistole, in der anderen eine offene Flasche Flamme der Reinheit — Lady Theodoras Lieblingsgetränkt.

languages.text: Idira Tlass ne parvint jamais à faire taire les murmures dans son esprit et succomba de nouveau à ses anciens penchants, les stimulants interdits et l'amasec. Les gens la surprenaient souvent en train de parler à une « Théodora » imaginaire ou de délirer à voix basse dans le noir. Un jour, on la retrouva morte d'une balle dans la tête, assise au bureau où Théodora von Valancius elle-même avait trouvé la mort. Elle tenait un pistolet-mitrailleur dans une main et dans l'autre, une bouteille de Flamme de pureté, le vin favori de dame Théodora.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, who was never able to subdue the whispers in her head, fell back on her old crutches of prohibited stimulants and amasec. People often saw her talking to an imaginary "Theodora" or deliriously muttering to herself in a dark corner. One day she was found with a hole in her head, sitting at the desk where Theodora von Valancius had died. She held an autopistol in one hand and in the other an open bottle of Flame of Purity wine — Lady Theodora's libation of choice.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass ne parvint jamais à faire taire les murmures dans son esprit et succomba de nouveau à ses anciens penchants, les stimulants et l'amasec. Les gens la surprenaient souvent en train de parler à une « Théodora » imaginaire ou de délirer à voix basse dans le noir. Un jour, on la retrouva décédée d'une balle dans la tête, derrière le bureau où Théodora von Valancius elle-même avait trouvé la mort. Elle tenait un pistolet-mitrailleur dans une main et dans l'autre, une bouteille de Flamme de pureté, le vin favori de dame Théodora.

languages.text: Idira Tlass, que nunca consiguió acallar los susurros de su cabeza, recayó en sus viejos amigos: los estimulantes prohibidos y el amasec. La gente la veía hablar con una «Theodora» imaginaria o murmurando delirante para sí misma en rincones oscuros. Un día, se la encontró con un agujero en la cabeza detrás del escritorio sobre el que Theodora von Valancius había muerto. Tenía una pistola automática en una mano y una botella abierta de vino Llama de la Pureza, el favorito de lady Theodora.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, who was never able to subdue the whispers in her head, fell back on her old crutches of prohibited stimulants and amasec. People often saw her talking to an imaginary "Theodora" or deliriously muttering to herself in a dark corner. One day she was found with a hole in her head, sitting at the desk where Theodora von Valancius had died. She held an autopistol in one hand and in the other an open bottle of Flame of Purity wine — Lady Theodora's libation of choice.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass, que nunca consiguió acallar los susurros de su cabeza, recayó en sus viejos amigos: los estimulantes y el amasec. La gente la veía hablar con una «Theodora» imaginaria o murmurando delirante para sí misma en rincones oscuros. Un día, se la encontró con un agujero en la cabeza detrás del escritorio sobre el que Theodora von Valancius había muerto. Tenía una pistola automática en una mano y una botella abierta de vino Llama de la Pureza, el favorito de lady Theodora.

languages.text: イディラ・トラスは、頭の中のささやきを抑えられず、違法の興奮剤とアマセックに浸る悪癖を取り戻した。彼女が想像上の「シオドーラ」に話しかける姿や、暗がりで独り言をつぶやく姿が何度も見かけられた。そしてある日、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスがこの世を去った机の影で、頭に風穴が開けた状態で座っているイディラが見つかった。一方の手にはオートピストルを携え、もう一方の手にはレディ・シオドーラへの献酒となったワイン「純潔の炎」の空き瓶が握られていた。
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, who was never able to subdue the whispers in her head, fell back on her old crutches of prohibited stimulants and amasec. People often saw her talking to an imaginary "Theodora" or deliriously muttering to herself in a dark corner. One day she was found with a hole in her head, sitting at the desk where Theodora von Valancius had died. She held an autopistol in one hand and in the other an open bottle of Flame of Purity wine — Lady Theodora's libation of choice.

traits.locale_text: イディラ・トラスは、頭の中のささやきを抑えられず、違法の興奮剤とアマセックに浸る悪癖を取り戻した。彼女が想像上の「シオドーラ」に話しかける姿や、暗がりで独り言をつぶやく姿が何度も見かけられた。そしてある日、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスがこの世を去った机の影で、頭に風穴が開けた状態で座っているイディラが見つかった。一方の手にはオートピストルを携え、もう一方の手にはレディ・シオドーラへの献酒となったワイン「純潔の炎」の空き瓶が握られていた。

languages.text: Kafasındaki fısıltıları bastırmayı başaramayan İdira Tlass; eski dayanaklarına, yani yasaklı uyarıcılara ve amaseke döndü. İnsanlar onu sık sık hayal ürünü bir "Theodora" ile konuşurken veya karanlık bir köşede kendi kendine mırıldanırken görüyordu. Bir gün Theodora von Valancius'un öldüğü masada, başında bir delikle bulundu. Bir elinde ototabanca, diğer elinde ise Leydi Theodora'nın gözde şarabı olan Saflık Alevi şişesi vardı.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, who was never able to subdue the whispers in her head, fell back on her old crutches of prohibited stimulants and amasec. People often saw her talking to an imaginary "Theodora" or deliriously muttering to herself in a dark corner. One day she was found with a hole in her head, sitting at the desk where Theodora von Valancius had died. She held an autopistol in one hand and in the other an open bottle of Flame of Purity wine — Lady Theodora's libation of choice.

traits.locale_text: Kafasındaki fısıltıları bastırmayı başaramayan İdira Tlass, eski dayanaklarına, yani yasaklı uyarıcılara ve amaseke geri döndü. İnsanlar onu sık sık hayal ürünü bir "Theodora" ile konuşurken veya karanlık bir köşede kendi kendine mırıldanırken görüyordu. Bir gün Theodora von Valancius'un öldüğü masada, başında bir delikle bulundu. Bir elinde ototabanca, diğer elinle ise açık bir şişe Saflık Alevi tutuyordu. Leydi Theodora'nın gözde şarabından.
